tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
    scheduled_date DATE,
    completion_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE robots (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 robot_name VARCHAR(50),
 maintenance_schedule VARCHAR(100))

CREATE TABLE maintenance_tasks (task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 task_name VARCHAR(50),
 task_description VARCHAR(255))

CREATE TABLE robot_maintenance (rm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 robot_id INT,
 task_id INT,
 due_date TIMESTAMP,
 completed_date TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE Robots (
    robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_schedule VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    last_maintenance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Maintenance_Log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    technician_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Technicians (
    technician_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    technician_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    specialization VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Maintenance_Types (
    type_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE robots ( 
   robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   robot_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
   manufacturer VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
   purchase_date DATE, 
   last_maintenance_date DATE 
 );

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule ( 
   schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   robot_id INT, 
   schedule_date DATE, 
   status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, 
   FOREIGN KEY(robot_id) REFERENCES robots(robot_id) 
 );

CREATE TABLE maintenance_tasks ( 
   task_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   task_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
   task_description TEXT, 
   frequency INT, 
   estimated_duration INT 
 );

CREATE TABLE robot_maintenance ( 
   maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   schedule_id INT, 
   task_id INT, 
   performed_date DATE, 
   duration_in_minutes INT, 
   FOREIGN KEY(schedule_id) REFERENCES maintenance_schedule(schedule_id), 
   FOREIGN KEY(task_id) REFERENCES maintenance_tasks(task_id) 
 );

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs ( 
   log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   maintenance_id INT, 
   log_date DATE, 
   log_description TEXT, 
   FOREIGN KEY(maintenance_id) REFERENCES robot_maintenance(maintenance_id) 
 );
